column4: Hello everyone, I'm using karmic koala and did some s/w upgrades .. and my desktop panels have disappeared completely. any directions?
Logomachist is having the same problem, try this thread first: http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=156602
I'm getting an 404 errors from the servers on my sources.list when i try to upgrade
sounds like those servers are no more or youre not connected to the internet
